name: IGG Game Assistant
description:
IGG Game Assistant is the official companion app for IGG games. Link your IGG ID with a single tap to check login records, purchase records, and access other game-related features. Discover other popular IGG titles, or view the latest news and guides on games you are already playing. All these services and more are just a tap away!

*Link for Real-Time Records
Link your IGG ID to access your account's login records, purchase records, and other information across all IGG games!

*Stay Informed and Updated
Get the latest news, guides, events, and more on all of IGG's most popular games!

*Be the First to Know About Updates & Events
Get a head start on game updates and events! You'll never miss out on another event reward!

*New Releases & Old Favorites
Get the latest info on all of IGG's titles, right at your fingertips!

*Made Just for You
Save guides, news, and articles on your favorite games, and create a collection of information that's just for you!
